name: viewports
description: _viewports.scss is a SASS microlibrary that makes it easier to manage media queries in responsive layouts

scripts.release-demo: git stash; rm index.css; sass index.scss > index-temp.css; cp index.html index-temp.html; git checkout gh-pages; mv index-temp.css index.css; mv index-temp.html index.html; git commit -a -m 'Update live demo from master.'

author: Jarno Rantanen <jarno@jrw.fi>
